attributes.additional_details: Bring in an american style system for sexual offenders and to make the starting point for sexual offences 15 years regardless of background and to abolish suspend sentences for sexual offences make prison the only option
attributes.background: Bring in an american style system for sexual offenders and to make the starting point of sexual offences 15 years and to abolish the suspend sentences for sexual offences make prison the only option

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608804

We could accept a petition calling for different changes to sentencing for sexual offences, but you would need to give a real name.
